lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. Coach Ben Howland, who has led the Bruins to the Final Four three straight years, agreed to a new seven-year contract through the 2014-15 season. Howland is guaranteed $1.97 million next season, with his compensation escalating to $2.3 million for the contract’s final season. The deal includes incentives of as much as $235,000 from his previous contract.
